text: Peter Francis Weller, Ph.D. (born June 24, 1947) is an American movie director, actor and educator. He is known for his role as RoboCop in RoboCop and RoboCop 2. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * History Channel's Engineering an Empire site * "RoboCop in Rome!" title: Peter Weller
